summary: Ok but do they ever get caught doing it in stepbros office? Maybe by Naomi or even Ivy?
question: Ok but do they ever get caught doing it in stepbros office? Maybe by Naomi or even Ivy?
answer:
They know that Naomi knows when they’re going at it, so they can count on her not disturbing then.

Ivy is a different story. She thought she’d get Harry all to herself if she were to stay past her shift since she knows that he would be doing so the same with another big project and all. So, she adjusts herself in the mirror, re-curling the ends of her hair and undoing a few extra bottons of her blouse so Harry is sure to get a preview of her cleavage, then topping it all off with a vast spritzes of perfume.

When she arrives outside his office door, she gives herself a little pep talk. “He won’t be able to resist you, not tonight,” she says confidantly. She doesn’t even bother knocking, pushing her way through the door as though she owned the place.

“Harry, was hoping you-” Her eyes nearly pop out of their sockets at the image before her.

“You like when I take you ov—Jesus fuck, get the hell out of my office!” Harry screams when he spots the intruder.

Y/n cranes her head back, eyebrows furrowed in annoyance because she was nearly there! “If you wouldn’t mind,” she starts, before turning back to her fiancé and smirking. “But we were in the middle of something, right baby?”

Harry returns her mischievous gaze, leaning down and kissing her chastely on the lips. He looks back to Ivy, still frozen by the door. “Ivy?”

Ivy snaps out of it at the sound of her name coming off his lips. “Yeah, Harry?” she replies flirtatiously, as though events of the last minute hadn’t occurred.

“Lock the door when you leave.”

summary: hi so i have a concept. living in loud and busy los angeles your entire life but moving to a small, strange rainy town in...
question: hi so i have a concept. living in loud and busy los angeles your entire life but moving to a small, strange rainy town in pacific northwest. spending your days trying to not die of bordom when during one of your long walks in rainy green and deep forest you stumble upon ruins of ancient fairy temple full of strange things and a door that leads to wonderous adventures. (u guessed it, i'm writing a book... maby... i dont know) sorry to bother you.
answer:

ive made it so if you listen in order, the start is the town part and it slowly changes throughout the path

summary: Twitter is full of dumb ignorant people, if you find their pools. What happened?
question: Twitter is full of dumb ignorant people, if you find their pools. What happened?
answer:
a girl i was in a group chat with said something racist but i didn’t see it because i had it muted all day (i was busy). i only saw it after the gc - who’s only got one other poc in it - exposed her. the girls said they only exposed her because she was talking shit about them and everyone came for them because they should have exposed her straight away. and honestly, i was even involved so i still dk much but another girl tweeted saying they didn’t mean for it to come off that way and there was a black girl (me) in the gc so of course they care about racism.

sis pulled the ‘i have a black friend’ card and it pissed me off and now we’re fighting about it. me and my friends tried educating her multiple times and she only replies with ‘yeah igy’ and ‘ok’.

(if you need me to be more specific just ask) xxx

summary: Inspired by the new pictures of Harry in art exhibitions, do you think you could do a blurb about the flatmates’s babes (before...
question: Inspired by the new pictures of Harry in art exhibitions, do you think you could do a blurb about the flatmates’s babes (before they got together) going to an art exhibition because y/n wants to go but has no one else to go with, and Harry realizes she es even more beautiful than the art that is being displayed?
answer:
Sorry for the late reply! 😅

.

“Look at those saggy boobs.”

“Harry!” Y/N covered his mouth as the old lady standing beside them gave them a dirty look and walked away in disgust. “What is wrong with you?”

He quickly removed her hand to show her the most annoying smirk she had ever seen. Poking her forehead, he said, “well this is your fault. You made me go to this stupid exhibition.”

“It’s not stupid, you’re just too dumb to admire art.” Y/N scoffed, rolling her eyes. “Besides, why did you even agree to go if you hate this?”

“I didn’t know it’d be this boring.”

“You’re boring.” She smacked his arm and turned to walk away, once again, missing out on that secret smile he had on his face. Of course he didn’t really care about those paintings. Sure they were beautiful, in some ways. But the main reason he wanted to come along was just her. He wouldn’t miss out on an opportunity to spend time with her, and to be honest, he was really enjoying himself. 

Y/N couldn’t shut up about those paintings which he didn’t understand. She went on and on about the colors and the meanings behind them, yet all he could make out was a horse with tiny legs. But if she said it was a masterpiece, he would just blindly agree.

“Harry, look, this one looks like you.” She snorted, pointing to a pig and he didn’t know why he found it funny. Shaking his head, he pointed to the previous painting of the naked witch. “That’s you, minus the saggy boobs.”

“Hey!” She covered her chest with both arms, making him laugh harder. 

“You should be glad, it’s actually a compliment for your boobs.”

“It’s weird that you even think about my boobs!”

“Why not? They’re cute! Ouch!” He jumped away when she smacked him on the arm again.

“Pervert,” she grumbled, but she couldn’t hide that smile on her face as she turned away and approached another piece of art. He stayed exactly where he was to watch her from a distance. She was too busy paying her entire attention to the painting to notice him pulling out his phone. But when he snapped a photo, she turned her head around instantly.

“Did you just take a photo?” She giggled, walking back to him and Harry swiftly hid his phone behind his back. “I thought you hated these paintings?”

“It’s for…instagram. To fool people into thinking I enjoy art,” he joked, making her laugh.

“Liar. You don’t even know how to use instagram. Lemme see it.”

“No.”

“Come on. Give me your phone.” She tugged on his sleeve, pouting like a child, but he had put his phone into his pocket and tried his best to push her away without actually hurting her. They were laughing so hard that a security had to walk over and tell them not to disturb the others or else he would have to ask them to leave.

Mumbling quick apologies, the pair tried their best to seem remorseful, yet the second the man walked away, they bumped their heads to each other from snickering so much.

“I know your password, I’m gonna look through your phone when you sleep,” she said as a joke, pointing a finger to his face. But he thought she was serious, so he ended up saying the truth.

“I…took a photo of you.”

“Of me?”

Harry nodded shyly. 

Y/N looked at him, eyes widened, he was literally holding his breath while waiting for an answer, a reaction, anything. For one second, he had made up a thousand scenarios in his head, the most far-fetched one being her kissing him on the cheek as a reward after seeing that pretty photo he’d taken of her. But reality wasn’t as great as his imagination. Instead of asking to see the shot, Y/N cracked up all of a sudden, holding onto his shoulder as she tossed her head back.

“Okay you know what? If you don’t wanna tell me the truth, it’s fine.” She shrugged, patting him on the arm. “Keep that saggy boobs photo to yourself.”

Harry didn’t say anything when she kept on walking ahead. Instead he pulled his phone out again and smiled at the photo of the girl he loved, just like his feelings, he would keep it to himself for now.

“I know your password, I’m gonna look through your phone when you sleep,” she said as a joke, pointing a finger to his face. But he thought she was serious, so he ended up saying the truth.

“I…took a photo of you.”

“Of me?”

Harry nodded shyly. 

Y/N looked at him, eyes widened, he was literally holding his breath while waiting for an answer, a reaction, anything. For one second, he had made up a thousand scenarios in his head, the most far-fetched one being her kissing him on the cheek as a reward after seeing that pretty photo he’d taken of her. But reality wasn’t as great as his imagination. Instead of asking to see the shot, Y/N cracked up all of a sudden, holding onto his shoulder as she tossed her head back.

“Okay you know what? If you don’t wanna tell me the truth, it’s fine.” She shrugged, patting him on the arm. “Keep that saggy boobs photo to yourself.”

Harry didn’t say anything when she kept on walking ahead. Instead he pulled his phone out again and smiled at the photo of the girl he loved, just like his feelings, he would keep it to himself for now.
